Package gerberFileReader

Class GraphicsState

  • java.lang.Object
    • gerberFileReader.GraphicsState
  • public class GraphicsState
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to hold the Gerber graphics state
    See Also:
    Section 2.7 of the Gerber Layer Format Specification

      • getCoordinateFormat

        public CoordinateFormat getCoordinateFormat()
                                     throws GerberLayerFormatException
        Returns:
        the current coordinate format
        Throws:
        GerberLayerFormatException - if no coordinate format has been set

        Sets the coordinate format
        Parameters:
        coordinateFormat - - the format to set

      • getUnit

        public Unit getUnit()
        Returns:
        the current coordinate units, defaults to inch if no unit has been specified

        Sets the coordinate units
        Parameters:
        unit - - the coordinate units to set

        Returns:

        currentPoint - - the current point to set

        Returns:

        public boolean isSingleQuadrantArcMode()
        Returns:
        true if single quadrant arc mode is in effect

      • getApertureTransformation

        public ApertureTransformation getApertureTransformation()
                                                 throws GerberLayerFormatException
        Returns:
        the current aperture transformation
        Throws:
        GerberLayerFormatException - if the aperture transformation has not been set

      • setApertureTransformation

        public void setApertureTransformation​(java.lang.String command)
                               throws GerberLayerFormatException
        Sets the current aperture transformation
        Parameters:
        command - - one of the Gerber commands: LP - Load Polarity, LM - Load Mirror, LR - LoadRotation, or LS - Load Scale
        Throws:
        GerberLayerFormatException - if the command is not valid
